questions.question: What handyman services do you offer?
questions.answer: Joe offers a wide range of handy services, including drywall repair, minor carpentry, fence repair, fixture installation (lights, fans), pressure washing, deck staining, and general property maintenance. If you have a specific repair or maintenance need, please don't hesitate to ask during your consultation!

questions.question: Can you combine handyman services with a painting project?
questions.answer: Absolutely! This is one of Joe's unique strengths. We can seamlessly integrate essential repairs (like drywall patching or wood rot replacement) before beginning a painting project, ensuring a perfect, lasting finish without the hassle of coordinating multiple contractors.

questions.question: Do you provide materials for handyman jobs?
questions.answer: For most handyman tasks, Joe can source and provide necessary materials (e.g., drywall compound, specific fixtures) at an agreed-upon cost, or you can provide them yourself. This will be discussed and clarified during the initial consultation.
